page.title: 04The Religion of Islam
page.content: Mecca is a city in Saudi Arabia. Saudi Arabia is very hot and much of it is desert. Bedouins are people who move around with their animals grazing. Mohammeds father died before he was born and his mother died when he was six. Abdul Tahib was his guardian. Mohammed became the agent of Khadijah and then later married her. At this time Mohammed was 25 and Khadijah was 40. Mohammed came into contact with many religions and he was interested in them all (Jews, Christians, Zoroastrains etc.) He was 40 when he had a vision of the Angel Gabriel. Many people resisted the new religion but by A.D. 630 it was the Dominant religion. He died in 632.
